# zoomFactor

**Instance Property**

The zoom factor for the live video in the camera.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var zoomFactor: Double { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to a value between the [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/DataScannerViewController/minZoomFactor] and [doc://com.apple.VisionKit/documentation/VisionKit/DataScannerViewController/maxZoomFactor] properties.

## Zooming

- **minZoomFactor**: The minimum zoom factor that the camera supports.
- **maxZoomFactor**: The maximum zoom factor that the camera supports.
